mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip_plan_board (trip_plan_title, trip_plan_user_id, trip_plan_img, trip_plan_content, register_time, trip_plan_hit) VALUES ( #{mainTitle}, #{userid}, #{img}, #{mainContent}, now(), 0);
INSERT INTO trip_plan_by_day (day_idx, title, content, trip_plan_article_no) VALUES ( #{dayIdx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{articleNo});

INSERT INTO trip_plan_pick_place (place_name, place_url, start_time, address_name, x, y, day_no, seq) VALUES ( #{place_name}, #{place_url}, #{startTime}, #{address_name}, #{x}, #{y}, #{dayNo}, #{seq});
mapper.select: select trip_plan_title as mainTitle, trip_plan_user_id as userid, trip_plan_img as img, trip_plan_content as mainContent from trip_plan_board
